snippet: Business and union leaders had lobbied against the suggested quota on new immigrants amid fears that it would harm Switzerland’s economy and ties to the European Union.
abstract: Swiss voters overwhelmingly reject proposal to drastically curb influx of foreigners seeking to work and live in their country, second major effort in 2014 aimed at restricting immigration; many union and business leaders there fear that quota would harm Switzerland's economy and ties to European Union.
lead_paragraph: Business and union leaders had lobbied against the suggested quota on new immigrants amid fears that it would harm Switzerland’s economy and ties to the European Union.

headline.main: Swiss Voters Reject Move to Restrict Immigrants
headline.print_headline: Swiss Voters Reject Move to Restrict Immigrants
